title: Kung fu as a folk art
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Roland Pirker, Pierre Stevens and Ban Hoe
brief_description: An art, a self-discipline, a martial skill, a philosophy, the ancient Chinese tradition of Kung Fu is all of these. This film follows a class of novices at a Canadian school of Kung Fu through to the completion of their three-year course.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Roland Pirker, Pierre Stevens and Ban Hoe
